Database

new Database(index, policy) → {Database}

NDN Database
Parameters:
Name Type Description
index ContentStore the in-memory ContentStore to do lookups on the underlying key-value store
policy Object policy an parameter option for deciding on policies for accepting/rejecting storage requests

Check the database for data matching an interest

Name Type Description
interest Object and NDN.Interest object
callback function recieves (err, element) err is null if everything is OK, element is a Buffer with the raw data packet
